action.primary: Resolves Phlegm, resolves toxicity and promotes urination

indications: Phlegm, cough and asthma, edema, scrofula, cancer, swelling of unknown origin

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Stomach Deficiency.

notes: It is said that this herb governs cervical lymph nodes.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.

For treatment of chronic bronchitis, grind Mao Yan Cao, Sm. Lepidii/Descurainiae #{TingLiZi} Ting Li Zi and Rx. Adenophorae #{ShaShen} Nan Sha Shen into a powder. Make the powder into 0.25g tablets. Take 6 tablets 3 times a day for a course of 20 days.
This herb is said to have the same functions as Rx. Euphorbiae Pekinensis #{HongJingDaJi} Hong/Jing Da Ji, but is somewhat milder.
